prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

Generative AI is experiencing a massive rise, comparable to the advent of personal computers and the early internet, and is expected to impact virtually every sector of human activity, creating both opportunities and challenges.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Generative AI, massive rise, personal computers, early internet, impact, sectors, opportunities, challenges
